channel.title: Little help with connecting
channel.description:
After about 3 months of not running a server or having my computer I want to get back to starting a server once again but, I have a problem I cannot connect to it at all. Things I have done to try to get it to work. (Firewall execeptions) (port-forwarding already done) (Client-side ip)(my lan ip) (server-side ip)(my ip) I have tried thoses following things and still cannot connect to my server here is what I get.
runclient: [java] java.net.NoRouteToHostException: No route to host: connect
So please a little help would be nice.(Before anyone posts[Use the Search engine] I already have and checked out for connecting to the servers). So after three months of me being gone I cannot connect to my server anymore.

item.title: Little help with connecting
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Your client side and server side ip’s are mixed up.

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with connecting
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

have you tried setting your Environment variables?

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with connecting
item.dc:creator: @wesely wesely
item.description:
@wesely wrote:

its the server side ip i know that much now. not sure which to use I have a wireless one and a wired one. both are different ip’s I have tried both and they dont work. I can log on with localhost and 127.0.0.1 but it wont work for me. the ip isnt regisitering for me which idk why.

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with connecting
item.dc:creator: @Razik-Blaze Razik-Blaze
item.description:
@Razik-Blaze wrote:

Well it must be 1 of them and i think port-forward cus thats the hardest part

Read full topic

item.description:
@wesely wrote:

After about 3 months of not running a server or having my computer I want to get back to starting a server once again but, I have a problem I cannot connect to it at all.
